text: Boban Babunski (born 5 May 1968) is a former Macedonian football player. He has played for the Yugoslavian national team and Macedonian national team. ==Statistics== ===Club=== Club performance Club performance Club performance League League Cup Cup League Cup League Cup Total Total Season Club League Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Yugoslavia Yugoslavia Yugoslavia League League Yugoslav Cup Yugoslav Cup League Cup League Cup Total Total 1985–86 Vardar First League 6 0 6 0 1986–87 19 0 19 0 1987–88 23 1 23 1 1988–89 14 0 14 0 1989–90 15 1 15 1 1990–91 Second League 38 5 38 5 1991–92 First League 26 7 26 7 Bulgaria Bulgaria Bulgaria League League Bulgarian Cup Bulgarian Cup League Cup League Cup Total Total 1992–93 CSKA Sofia A Football Group 22 2 22 2 1993–94 18 2 18 2 Spain Spain Spain League League Copa del Rey Copa del Rey Copa de la Liga Copa de la Liga Total Total 1994–95 Lleida Segunda División 31 1 31 1 1995–96 31 1 31 1 Japan Japan Japan League League Emperor's Cup Emperor's Cup J.League Cup J.League Cup Total Total 1996 Gamba Osaka J1 League 14 1 4 0 3 0 21 1 1997 23 5 2 1 5 1 30 7 1998 1 0 0 0 0 0 1 0 Greece Greece Greece League League Greek Cup Greek Cup League Cup League Cup Total Total 1998–99 AEK Athens Superleague Greece 8 0 8 0 Spain Spain Spain League League Copa del Rey Copa del Rey Copa de la Liga Copa de la Liga Total Total 1999–00 Logroñés Segunda División 33 0 33 0 Belgium Belgium Belgium League League Belgian Cup Belgian Cup League Cup League Cup Total Total 1999–00 Sint-Truiden Belgian Pro League 1 0 1 0 Germany Germany Germany League League DFB-Pokal DFB-Pokal DFB Ligapokal DFB Ligapokal Total Total 2000–01 Chemnitzer FC 2.
